title: Europe's Most Modern Plant-Based Meat Facility Opens
excerpt: Our new production facility in Memmingen, Germany is now operational â€” the largest and most advanced plant-based meat production site in Europe.
content: This is a milestone for planted and for plant-based food in Europe. Our new 25,000 square meter facility in Memmingen, Bavaria, represents a CHF 100 million investment in the future of sustainable protein. With state-of-the-art production lines, we can now produce enough planted products to serve millions more consumers across Europe. The facility runs on 100% renewable energy and sets new standards for sustainable food manufacturing.
author: Planted Team
